name: Asteroid Belt (nuvaruno)
description:
Game is still in development. Please share any thoughts. 

Asteroid Belt is an intense and thrilling space adventure where you take control of a spacecraft navigating through a dangerous asteroid belt. Your mission is to survive while collecting valuable resources and upgrades along the way. The asteroids in your path are a constant threat, but with clever manoeuvring, you can avoid danger and come out on top. With each successful run, you can upgrade your ship and enhance its capabilities, making it easier to navigate through the treacherous belt. The collectibles scattered throughout the belt offer you valuable boosts such as additional fuel, shielding, and upgrades to help you on your journey. So, strap in and get ready for an action-packed adventure through the Asteroid Belt!

How to play:

  • Move left and right with arrow keys. Every move consumes fuel.
  • Move faster as long as you press forward arrow.
  • Select upgrades with Space or Enter.
  • Black holes kill you immediately.
